docs.text: Jenkins安装 添加apt源 curl -fsSL https://pkg.jenkins.io/debian-stable/jenkins.io-2023.key | sudo tee \ /usr/share/keyrings/jenkins-keyring.asc > /dev/null echo deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/jenkins-keyring.asc] \ https://pkg.jenkins.io/debian-stable binary/ | sudo tee \ /etc/apt/sources.list.d/jenkins.list > /dev/null 安装 Jenkins sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install fontconfig openjdk-11-jre sudo apt-get install jenkins 访问 Jenkins UI
docs.title: Jenkins安装

docs.text: curl -fsSL https://pkg.jenkins.io/debian-stable/jenkins.io-2023.key | sudo tee \ /usr/share/keyrings/jenkins-keyring.asc > /dev/null echo deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/jenkins-keyring.asc] \ https://pkg.jenkins.io/debian-stable binary/ | sudo tee \ /etc/apt/sources.list.d/jenkins.list > /dev/null
docs.title: 添加apt源

docs.text: sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install fontconfig openjdk-11-jre sudo apt-get install jenkins
docs.title: 安装 Jenkins
